text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-142, see notes under § 38-751.01.

DC CODE § 38-755.02

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: "Chancellor" means the chief executive officer of the District of Columbia Public Schools appointed pursuant to § 38-174.
"DCPS" means the District of Columbia Public Schools established by § 38-171.
